basic_info.description: 👋 Hello, I'm Christopher Biediger—a Frontend Developer based in Sneads Ferry, NC. I specialize in crafting user-friendly web applications with a keen focus on seamless experiences. With a solid background in frontend development, I approach each project with precision, aiming to create practical user journeys and clean interfaces.
basic_info.description2: I stay updated on the latest trends, especially within the React ecosystem. Check out my evolving portfolio, showcasing projects in React JS, Node, Firebase, TypeScript, and PostgreSQL. I am actively seeking new opportunities, I'm open to collaborations and excited to contribute to fun projects.

projects.title: Facial Recognition
projects.description: This application allows you to pull any image and, using the Carifai API, it will find the face(s) in the picture. This project has a frontend written in JavaScript and React and a backend written in Node, Express, and uses PostgreSQL for a database.

projects.title: Preferred Ecommerce
projects.description: This application allows you to pull any image and, using the Carifai API, it will find the face(s) in the picture. This project has a frontend written in JavaScript and React and a backend written in Node, Express, and uses PostgreSQL for a database.

projects.title: 3D Object Viewer
projects.description: Jedna z pierwszych aplikacji nad którymi pracowałam na stażu. Musiałam przygotować front-end dla aplikacji, która pokazuje modele 3D znanych budynków. To był także mój pierwszy projekt w frameworku Angular. Dużo się nauczyłam!
